page.title: 13PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: In our playground we play games like{hop-scotch, had}and{numbers.}They sometimes take up a lot of the playground but normally not many games take up much space. One of the most popular games is {had,}(it is sometimes called{it)}and you need more than two people to play. One person is made{it;}he has to chase the others and tap someone on the back and say{had. }That person is now{it, then you carry on until everybody is tired and hot. There are lots of games similar to{it}but in some games like {off ground touch}you do something else as well. In that game{it}cannot catch anybody if they are{off the ground. Our games that we play now are quite simple but who knows what they will be like in{900 years'}time. Only time will tell!
